snippet: The second base position is as thin as first base is deep. If you insist on having an elite second baseman, you're going to have to spend one of your first two picks on one of the top three.
abstract: The second base position is as thin as first base is deep. If you insist on having an elite second baseman, you're going to have to spend one of your first two picks on one of the top three.

byline.original: By JUSTIN SABLICH and JASON SABLICH
